resources.string: Password length cannot be less than 8 characters

MyPayID is created as an attempt to bring the details of various digital payment IDs of users spread across different platforms at one place. \n\nUsers can complete their payment profiles and add all the payment methods they use in one place, furthermore users can also search for all payment methods of other users by their Names, Phone number and Email ID.
Developer details : \n\n Aryan Chauhan Email : sansarya2121@gmail.com
Please check you mail and click verification link to verify your account. After verifying, come back to app and click refresh to continue.
